metadata.name: Surfer
metadata.description:
I took this photo of the surfer entering the sea after doing a trail early in the morning from the top of a hill on an isolated beach on Florianópolis, in the south of Brazil. The beautiful textures of the sand and water helped a lot in the result of the final minimalist composition.

Title: Surfer  
Artist: Giovani Cordioli  
Series: Minimalist Nature  
Edition: 1/1  
Location: Florianópolis / Brazil  
Dimensions: 4016 × 6016px  
Year: 2022
